ch0118_50_lillie/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go all-out and
make this day a special one!
ch0118_50_lillie/7101_0701_02_10:
It reminds me of when I used to go stargazing
with my mother when I was young.
ch0118_50_lillie/7101_0701_03_10:
For me, this outfit is almost nostalgic... It makes
me feel like I’m never alone!
ch0118_50_lillie/7102_0701_01_10: Did you know that Cosmog evolves into Cosmoem?
ch0118_50_lillie/7102_0701_02_10:
In the distant past, Cosmoem used to be called the
cocoon of the stars. It almost sounds like it’d be a
Bug-type Pokémon, doesn’t it?
ch0118_50_lillie/7103_0701_01_10:
As long as I’m with Lunala, there’s no end to how
much of the world we can explore!
ch0118_50_lillie/7103_0701_02_10:
I just hope I can always be together with my
Pokémon...and that you can do the same with
your partner, too!
ch0118_50_lillie/7104_0701_01_10:
When I first started traveling around Alola, I had
to rely on Max Repels. Even now, I always keep
track of how many I have on me.
ch0118_50_lillie/7104_0701_02_10:
If you’re wondering, I actually don’t have any on
me right now because I don’t need them on Pasio!
ch0118_50_lillie/7105_0701_01_10:
Before, I only used to wear what my mother
bought for me.
ch0118_50_lillie/7105_0701_02_10:
But I started going shopping with my friends here
on Pasio, and now I have some experience
shopping for my own clothes!
ch0118_50_lillie/7105_0701_03_10:
I’m a little worried about this dress... I do hope
I’m pulling it off OK...
ch0118_50_lillie/7105_0701_04_10:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Does it look OK on me?
ch0118_50_lillie/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve been looking all over for you! Here you go!
ch0118_50_lillie/1701_0702_01_10: Lunala found it! I hope you like it!
ch0118_50_lillie/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever I look at Lunala, I remember Nebby, the
Cosmog I used to travel with.
ch0118_50_lillie/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve left Nebby with someone I trust, so I don’t
have to worry right now...
ch0118_50_lillie/2501_0701_03_10: But I can’t wait till I can see them both again!
ch0118_50_lillie/2501_0701_04_10: Do you know what I mean?
ch0118_50_lillie/2501_0702_01_10:
Lunala is always so cool! I wonder if I should give
it a title!
ch0118_50_lillie/2501_0702_03_10:
Hmm... That doesn’t quite fit, does it? I suppose
my cute Lunala’s just always going to be Lunala
to me!
ch0118_50_lillie/2511_0701_01_10:
In the past, I used to hate the idea of Pokémon
battling and getting hurt.
ch0118_50_lillie/2511_0701_02_10:
But as long as I’m brave enough to step up when
they need protection, I think it’s important to push
forward—even when things look tough.
ch0118_50_lillie/2511_0702_01_10:
I have to believe in my friends, after all. That’s
one way to build a bond with each other.
ch0118_50_lillie/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s something I learned from another Trainer I
know...and also from watching you!
ch0118_50_lillie/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I’m always excited for the start of
a new day!
ch0118_50_lillie/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi! Every day is a special day for someone.
Just thinking about that makes me really happy!
ch0118_50_lillie/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! The sun’s gone down, and the
moon is rising... Maybe I should get to bed soon.
